mission.title: My Mission
mission.text1: I am a dedicated fullstack developer with an AI background, committed to delivering innovative and tailored solutions to meet the unique needs of my clients.
mission.text2: I work collaboratively with clients to create high-quality, scalable, and user-friendly applications that drive real business results, with a focus on decentralized services and an ecological approach to development.
mission.text3: I pride myself on my commitment to excellence, attention to detail, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Whether you're a startup or an established business, I'm here to help you achieve your digital goals.

quick_contact.title: Quick Contact
quick_contact.subtitle: Need a quick response? Use one of these options

q1.question: What types of projects do you take on?
q1.answer: I work on a variety of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications, AI integration, and mobile apps. If you have a digital project in mind, let's talk!

q2.question: How long does a typical project take?
q2.answer: It depends on the project complexity. A simple website might take 2-4 weeks, while a complex web application could take 2-6 months. I always provide a detailed timeline after our initial consultation.

q3.question: Do you provide ongoing maintenance?
q3.answer: Yes, I offer ongoing maintenance and support services for all my projects. This includes updates, bug fixes, and feature enhancements.

q4.question: Do you work with international clients?
q4.answer: Absolutely! I work with clients from around the world. I'm available for video calls and email communication across multiple time zones.

home.title: Kaktuse - Crafting impactful web solutions
home.description: Kaktuse is a web development agency that crafts impactful web solutions for businesses and startups.
